name: Lisa: The Pointless - Scholar of the Wilbur Sin Edition
storyline: Lisa: The Pointless - Scholar of the Wilbur Sin Edition expands upon Alex and Joel's journey through Garbage Island and Downtown Olathe by adding new enemies, bosses, party members, and locations. Take a walk in a park, talk with fishmen, party hard, do some yoga, and embrace Infinity.
summary: A mod of LISA: The Pointless made as a love-letter to the game and its world. Scholar of the Wilbur Sin is an expansion mod that adds new content to every inch of the original adventure. There are new foes to face, new areas to discover, new items to trade, and new stories to enjoy. Recruit three brand new party members on your quest to traverse the wasteland and find a better place.
